357.html:
Scalability
	1. Approximately how much user base the willbe handling
	2. At any given time how much users will be accessing this service
	3. Is it limited to sri lanka users only or international

Server Infrastructure
	1. SSL certificate
	2. Separate AWS server instances for Application
	3. Separate AWS server instances for Database & Backup
	4. Backup scheduling, Daily Based.
	5. Backup for the Backup
	
Technology Stack
	1. Java Spring & Mysql ( or pgsql ) based server stack
	2. Client side HTML5, CSS3, JS & jQuery
	
Deliverables
	1. Admin user interface
		a. Managing users
	  	b. Managing roles
		c. Managing capabilities
		d. Transaction Report management
		e. Transaction Logging management

	2. User interface ( end users )
		a. Profile management
		b. Account summary
		c. Transaction management ( deposit, withdraw, transfer )

358.html:
Things we need before starting 

	1. They need a license from their respective finance regulatory ( To handle e money, wallet service )
	2. PCI DSS ( Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard ) certified, for storing customer informations like Credit card & Bank Account details
	
	
Timeline

	Phase 1. ( Two weeks )
		Base Database Schema Development ( for storing Profile, Bank Account, Credit Cards, Transactions, Logging ... ) 
		Implement PCI DSS certified encrypted storage
		
	
	Phase 2. ( Two weeks )
		Admin user interface development
		
		
	Phase 3. ( Two weeks )
		End user interface development
		
		
	Phase 4. ( Four weeks )
		Connecting with testing Merchant Account
		and do the testing transaction by using dummy user bank account
		
	Phase 5. ( Two weeks )
		Connecting with Production Account
		and do the testing
		
		
	Phase 6.	
		Go Live
